00057 #ifndef IMPACT_DATAFLOW_H
00058 #define IMPACT_DATAFLOW_H
00059 
00060 /* 10/29/02 REK Adding config.h */
00061 #include <config.h>
00062 #include <library/set.h>
00063 
00064 #define MAX_NODE_ID     (16*1024)       /* instr[] */
00065 #define MAX_REG_ID      (16*1024)       /* vr[] */
00066 
00067 struct I_Node
00068 {
00069   /*
00070    *      The caller must define the below 3 fields.
00071    */
00072   int id;                       /* the instruction ID */
00073   Set dest_reg;                 /* 0/1 result register */
00074   Set src_reg;                  /* 0/N source registers */
00075   /*
00076    *      The following information are automatically
00077    *      derived from the above information.
00078    */
00079   Set gen;                      /* the expression itself */
00080   Set kill;                     /* the expressions killed by it */
00081   Set use;                      /* the source registers */
00082   Set def;                      /* the destination registers */
00083   /*
00084    *      Use-definition analysis.
00085    *      rd-chain
00086    */
00087   Set e_in;
00088   Set e_out;
00089   /*
00090    *      Available expressions.
00091    */
00092   Set a_in;
00093   Set a_out;
00094   /*
00095    *      Live-variable life.
00096    */
00097   Set v_in;
00098   Set v_out;
00099   /*
00100    *      Dominator information
00101    */
00102   Set dom;
00103   Set post_dom;
00104   /*
00105    *      Internal variables (shoule not be used by the user)
00106    */
00107   short defined;                /* internal use */
00108 };
00109 
00110 struct I_Reg
00111 {
00112   Set e_def;                    /* the set of nodes that define it */
00113   Set e_use;                    /* the set of nodes that use it */
00114   short defined;                /* internal use */
00115 };
00116 
00117 
00118 #define REACH_DEFINE            1
00119 #define USE_DEF_CHAIN           2
00120 #define LIVE_VAR                4
00121 #define DOMINATOR               8
00122 #define POST_DOMINATOR          16
00123 
00124 #ifdef __cplusplus
00125 extern "C"
00126 {
00127 #endif
00128 
00129   extern struct I_Node *find_df_node (int id);
00130   extern struct I_Reg *find_df_reg (int reg_id);
00131   extern void define_df_graph (void);
00132   extern void add_df_node (int id);
00133   extern void add_df_node_src_reg (int reg_id);
00134   extern void add_df_node_dest_reg (int reg_id);
00135   extern void connect_df_node (int src_id, int dest_id);
00136   extern void end_df_graph (void);
00137   extern void analyze_df_graph (int mode);
00138   extern void print_df_node (FILE * F, struct I_Node *node);
00139   extern void print_df_graph (FILE * F);
00140 
00141 #ifdef __cplusplus
00142 }
00143 #endif
00144 
00145 #endif
